summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 7th Avenue North, form Prospect Street to the north line of Lake Union Supplemental Addition, by constructing concrete sidewalks, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1170 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
